name: Army of One (itch)
description:
Arm yourself against the horde of orcs!

This is barely a finished game, here's what you need to know!
- Use the arrows to move, hold space to attack
- Press R to restart the game, for example when you died
- If you've destroyed the portal that the orcs came from, consider yourself a true hero!

There's not much level design, but I hope you get some enjoyment out of the mechanic!

Have fun!

- Egg
